Multiclass-Witch -- Male Versatile Human Investigator: 5
Strength: +2 Dexterity: +3 Constitution: +2 Intelligence: +2 Wisdom: +2 Charisma: +2
Background: Royalty Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 4368/5000 Level: 5 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 7/12

Armor Speed Penalty: -5 Speed
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 8 from any)

Feature Notes:

Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feats (Choose 2 from any)
Basic Witchcraft: Class Feat (Choose 1 from any Witch up to level 2)
Devise A Stratagem: Has the Attack Stratagem and Skill Stratagem features
General Feats: General Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Interrogation: Has the No Cause For Alarm and Pointed Question features
Investigator Feats: Class Feats (Choose 3 from any)
Methodology: 1 selection
On The Case: Has the Clue In and Pursue A Lead features
Patron: 1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 2 from any)
Skillful Lessons: Skill Feat (Choose 2 from any)
Versatile Human: General Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Witch Dedication: Has the Familiar, Patron, and Witch Spellcasting features
Devise A Stratagem: Can use Attack Stratagem or Skill Stratagem once per rd
Familiar: Has a Tiny animal minion
Perception: +11 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +8 (dexterity; trained) Games Lore: +11 (intelligence; expert) Religion: +17 (wisdom; %1)
Arcana: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Giant Lore: +11 (intelligence; expert) Sailing Lore: +9 (intelligence; trained)
Architecture Lore: +9 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +2 (charisma; untrained) Society: +11 (intelligence; expert)
Athletics: +0 (strength; untrained) Medicine: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +8 (dexterity; trained)

Languages: Common; Draconic; Jotun; Kelish
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Games Lore): Skill Expert (Games Lore)
Additional Lore (Giant Lore): Skill Expert (Giant Lore)
Armor Skill Penalty: -2 strength and dexterity skills
Faith's Flamekeeper: Skill Trained (Religion)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Interrogation: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Investigator Skills: Skill Trained (Society; Choose 6 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 4 from any)
Skill Training (Architecture Lore): Skill Trained (Architecture Lore)
Assurance (Acrobatics): Can take an automatic 17 on Acrobatics checks
Clue In: (R) Gives another creature +1 on the triggering Perception or skill check that will help to answer an active investigation question once per 10 min
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Interrogation: Can Pursue A Lead and Make An Impression simultaneously
Keen Recollection: +5 on untrained Recall Knowledge checks
No Cause For Alarm: Successful Diplomacy reduces frightened levels by 1 in a 10' emanation, or by 2 on a critical success
Pointed Question: (1) Successful Diplomacy vs. Will gives +2 Perception to detect a Lie and inflicts off-guard vs. Attack Stratagem until the end of the turn; critical success gives +4 Perception; critical failure worsens the target's attitude by 1 step
Pursue A Lead: Can use 1 min examining a detail to detect a deeper mystery; success allows opening an investigation and gives +1 on later Perception and skill checks when attempting to answer a central question about it
Sense Allies: R60' Willing undetected allies are hidden instead and can be targeted with a DC 5 flat check
Skill Stratagem: (1) Refrains from attacking a chosen creature to gain +1 on the next intelligence-, wisdom-, or charisma-based skill or Perception check involving it before the start of the next turn
Combat
Hit Points: 58 Armor Class: 15 (dexterity (1 max); untrained) Class DC: Investigator: 19 (intelligence; trained)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bola (+12 1d6+2 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Light Mace (+12 1d4+2 B; dexterity; expert); Main-gauche (+12 1d4+2 P/S; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry (Bo Staff): Weapon Familiarity (Bo Staff)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Attack Stratagem: (1) Uses a pre-rolled value for the first attack vs. a chosen creature before the start of the next turn; can substitute intelligence for strength or dexterity on the attack if using a sap or an agile, finesse, or ranged weapon
Strategic Strike: Successful Attack Stratagems that use intelligence inflict +2d6 HP precision
Save: Fortitude: +9 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +12 (dexterity; expert); Will: +11 (wisdom; expert)
Magic
Spell Slots: D1: 2; D4: 2; D7: 1; DC1: 1 Attack: Divine: +13 (intelligence; master) Spell DC: Divine: 23 (intelligence; master)
Magic Notes:
Basic Witch Spellcasting: Has 1 1st-rank divine spell slot
Expert Witch Spellcasting: Spell Expert (Divine)/Has 1 4th-rank divine spell slot
Faith's Flamekeeper: Spell Trained (Divine)
Master Witch Spellcasting: Spell Master (Divine)/Has 1 7th-rank divine spell slot
Patron's Breadth: Has additional archetype spell slots
Witch Dedication: Can cast a choice of 2 divine cantrips each day
Witch Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Notes
Validation Errors:
Advanced Witchcraft Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and basic witchcraft feature (currently 1)
Class Feats Allocation: 5 available vs. 7 allocated
Expert Witch Spellcasting Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12, basic witch spellcasting feature (currently 1) and rank.patron skill >= 3
Master Witch Spellcasting Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 18, expert witch spellcasting feature (currently 1) and rank.patron skill >= 4
Patron's Breadth Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8 and basic witch spellcasting feature (currently 1)
